Name: GrassGames Hearts 3
About the game: GrassGames' Hearts is a beautiful 3D computer game version of the popular Hearts card game for 3 or 4 players. Main Features: - Play locally, online, or over your home network - 'American', 'Omnibus Hearts' and 'Black Maria' variants included - Intelligent Computer opponents - Online rankings system - Replays & Statistics
